title: Where to Find Small Champion Updates?
body:
I always assumed champions are constantly getting small updates like "q does 10 less damage" or "ult lasts 5 seconds longer" and I figured that's how they determine the free champ rotation, to see if that small update makes the champion better or worse.  Can someone tell me where to find these small updates if hey exist, because I feel like one week I can play a champion and do really good, then a couple weeks later I play the same champion and have the same build but can't do as much with it.

Please don't link the champion update page because all it shows is the REWORKED champions, not small updates.

replies.body: The[ free rotation champions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752864-Choosing-the-Right-Champion) that make an appearance aren't necessarily due to changes made to them, but to provide a flexibility for various roles.  You can keep posted on different changes on champions through our [Patch ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch)site, which can be used as a great archive.  Hope that helps!
That's exactly what I was looking for, thanks
